price: Ne sais-tu pas qu’à Allah, appartient le royaume des cieux et de la terre, et qu’en dehors d’Allah vous n’avez ni protecteur ni secoureur?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam taʿlam anna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
